nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 standard token implementation.
@dev Standard ERC20 token. This contract follows the implementation at https://goo.gl/mLbAPJ.
nodes.name: Token

nodes.documentation: @dev Trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation: @dev Trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
nodes.name: Approval

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the name of the token.
nodes.name: name

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the symbol of the token.
nodes.name: symbol

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the number of decimals the token uses.
nodes.name: decimals

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the total token supply.
nodes.name: totalSupply

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
@param _owner The address from which the balance will be retrieved.
nodes.name: balanceOf
transfer
approve
allowance
transferFrom
